title: U.S. per capita consumption of fresh lettuce ( romaine and leaf ) 2000 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Per capita consumption in pounds, containing a total of 19 data points.
Overall Per capita consumption in pounds has increased over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Per capita consumption in pounds, of value 15.0 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Per capita consumption in pounds about 8.0 was reached at Year 2001
min_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Per capita consumption in pounds, containing a total of 19 data points.
In general Per capita consumption in pounds has rose over the Year.
